body_html:
Similar issue mentioned in #8477 (comment) (issue 8477)

And I avoid the error mentioned above through simply add before torch.save:

time.sleep(10)

But I think such issue should be fixed for further update or at least give more frinedly error message? thx a lot for all contributors for Pytorch

body:
Similar issue mentioned in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8477#issue-332298760 (issue 8477)

And I avoid the error mentioned above through simply add before torch.save:

> time.sleep(10)

But I think such issue should be fixed for further update or at least give more frinedly error message? thx a lot for all contributors for Pytorch
